text: Beyond complaints, the system also enables companies to actively listen to employees through digital in app surveys.
Surveys are initiated directly from the system by defining a clear title, short description and visibility period.
They can be launched in multiple languages, allowing employees to respond in their native language and improving participation and accuracy.
Participants can be carefully selected based on designation department, unit or gender.
The system also supports random sampling using employee IDs or CNICs, ensuring surveys remain statistically representative while maintaining data integrity.
Once a survey is launched, selected employees receive automated invitations through the FOSSMS service.
Each message includes a direct survey link, making it easy to participate even for employees who do not use the mobile app.
Employees submit their responses at their convenience through the mobile app.
All responses remain confidential, encouraging honest and unbiased feedback.
As responses come in, the system automatically compiles real time survey reports.
Management can instantly view response rates, summary statistics, charts and trends through the dashboard for open ended questions.
Built in, AI tools analyze employee feedback and group responses by sentiment positive, neutral or negative, transforming raw input into clear, actionable insights.
This digital survey module helps helps organizations switch from reactive grievance handling to proactive employee engagement and continuous improvement.
